uiDefinition.tooltip: Provide URL of the Retail Server

uiDefinition.description: URL to use in case of channel not having properly configured profile/media server. Expected to be in form of "https://.../imageFileData/search?fileName= ".
uiDefinition.tooltip: Provide URL to use in case of channel not having properly configured profile/media server.

properties.description: The connector exposes actions to search and browse product related information like catalogs, inventory, price and recommendations. The connector connects to the Commerce Cloud Scale Unit (CSU) as a wrapper to provide the headless commerce APIs in simplified and easy way so businesses can easily consume and build Commerce applications.
